General.Name: Royalindo Investa Wijaya
General.Description: PT Royalindo Investa Wijaya Tbk, through its subsidiaries, manages and rents boarding facilities in Indonesia. It operates three rental facilities, including the PJ Mansion, Puri Cempaka 04, and Le Mansion Senopati. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Central Jakarta, Indonesia.

2.Name: Ms. Jennifer  Soemedi
2.Title: Head of the Internal Audit Unit
